hi
i've got original mw2, i will be banned if i overwrite the files?

so it's cracked, but not for common use
Thx vm to uploader tho
so i have the original version of mw2 and if i get banned i will go and download 1 from the mw2 games in this site.. (should i do that?)
i open the game after all this progress and it says : cheat detected, and closes lol help?

if it says cheat detected then you are fucked. especially if you are using a real steam account and a real mw2 serial. if it says cheat detected that means you are banned forever. they will never un-ban that account. you will have to buy a new mw2 and register it on a new steam account.
